title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Park Statistics
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Park Statistics              Park Statistics       Acreage Gross Area within recreation area boundary for FY 2009: 153,250 Acres of Land Property owned and managed by the National Park Service within the recreation area boundary: 23,185.48 Acres  Visitation Total Recreation Visits till Aug 2009: 477,676 Total Visits for FY 2008: 504,444 Total Visits for FY 2007: 604,151 (Visitation numbers only include visits on Federal sites within the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area.)  Designations National Recreation Area, November 10, 1978
